attributes.additional_details:
Im trying to send a petition to the Barbie doll factory to make a Hope Barbie doll in the uk, so we can raise money for all the cancer patients out there who may not have the money to pay for special tratment so all the money we raise will go to cancer research.

im trying to show that every cancer patient is beautiful in there own way even if they have lost their hair because of the different treatments they are having, so please help us get enough people ♥ ♥
